import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { // =================== Chnage background header ================= window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = document.querySelector(".header"); // when the scroll is higher than 200 viewport height, add the scroll-header class to a tag with the header tag if (this.scrollY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }); // =================== Toggle Menu ================= const [Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const [activeNav, setActiveNav] = useState("") return (
